name: Heavy Cargo Transport-er: Grand Truck Driving 3D
name_original: Heavy Cargo Transport-er: Grand Truck Driving 3D
description:
"This game is totally ADS FREE, Buy once and enjoy!"

Heavy Cargo Transporter Truck Driver Simulator 2017 PRO Edition!
Get ready for an exciting OFF-ROAD Transporter driving simulation experience, the Game of all time which beats all other truck games, cargo Truck games and car transporter games. In this newest cargo truck transporter simulator you get to drive around in different vehicles such as a Heavy freight Truck Trailer, a Big Offroad Cargo Truck also known as Cargo Transporter Truck. You will use this to transport cargo trailer around the city and a big offroad uphill climb track in a 18 wheeler grand truck which would be fun to play with.
This Heavy Truck Trailer 4x4 Cargo game will surely test you pro driving skills when you have to drive an 18 wheeler trailer with heavy cargo. Cargo transportation is itself a challenging task but its challenge multiplies when it is in mountainous and hilly environment. Offroad driving tricks are much different from road driving. You have to face multiple dangerous turns and steep climb movement.
Become a Heavy Cargo truck driver in this exciting new 4wd Big Truck Simulator 2017 3D game. Get in your truck and deliver cargo to your ending point. Carry all the materials and other things very carefully to your destination.
Goods Transportation Missions
Transport goods in your transporter truck or just load cargo in your cargo lorry or Transport oil in your oil truck and take it to different places, like uphill Off Road mountain track or urban city. Get behind the wheel of your euro truck and make sure you successfully complete your trucking missions.
Do you think you can easily become a huge lorry driver that carries a heavy load? Grand Trucking may not be that easy as you might know. Your job in this game is to load the heavy cargo on the car transporter trailer. Deliver cargo in the 4wd cargo trolley truck. Drive the vehicles from the truck parking lot to the other points in the map and earn some cash.

Features:
• Hilly and mountains Environment.
• Exciting New 20 Levels.
• 3D and Optimised Graphics.
• HD Sound Quality.
• Friendly Mode Game.
• New Models of Trucks and Trailers
• New models of 4x4 Jeeps and vehicles.
• Realistic physics.

So, Are you ready for the best multi euro simulator game of all time, accept the challenge you euro truckers out there!

Enjoy the Game and waiting for your Feedback.
Good Luck!
